name: thermo_reimager_app
description: Visual UI for Probelab Reimager using Electron

scripts.package: rm -fr ./bin/unpackaged && npm run build-prod && node package.js && cd ./bin/unpackaged && npm install --production && cd ../.. && electron-packager ./bin/unpackaged --out ./bin --overwrite
scripts.win-package: del /F /Q "./bin/unpackaged" && npm run build-prod && node package.js && cd ./bin/unpackaged && npm install --production && cd ../.. && electron-packager ./bin/unpackaged --out ./bin --overwrite

author: Bob620
